name: Upsell Order Bump Offer for WooCommerce Pro
author: WP Swings

sections.description:
Add premium features to the Upsell Order Bump Offer plugin such as Multiple Order Bumps, Smart Offer Upgrade and Smart Skip if Already Purchased.

Visit plugin site →
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements
  • WordPress 4.4 or greater
  • Woocommerce 3.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Extension, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
Then click Upload Plugin from the browse button you can choose the upsell-order-bump-offer-for-woocommerce-pro.zip file and press ok, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.


Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our extension and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application.
sections.changelog:
Version 2.1.1

  • New: Red Arrow pointing towards offer checkbox feature.
  • New: Minor Bug fixes,
  • New: Compatible with latest WP and WC

Version 2.1.0

  • New: Inbuilt Migrator for existing users to import all plugins data at once.
  • New: Minor Bug fixes,
  • New: Compatible with latest WP and WC

Version 2.0.2

  • New: Notice display of current version for WP Swings
  • New: Minor Bug fixes
  • New: Compatible with latest WP and WC

Version 2.0.1

  • Bug Fixes
  • Quantity of Order Bump
  • Priority of upsell Order Bump
  • Clone Order Bump
  • Global Order Bump offer
Version 2.0.0

  • Bug Fixes
  • Compatibility with Subscriptions For WooCommerce
  • Compatibility with MWB Role Based Pricing for WooCommerce
  • Compatibility with Ultimate Gift Cards For WooCommerce

Version 1.3.1

  • New -Exclusive Limits: Skip order bump if already used till a fixed limit.
  • New -Meta Forms: Add a custom form when order bump is accepted.
  • New -Restrict Woo coupons: Restrict Woocommerce coupons discount on offer product.
  • Improved -Better Security and Performance.
  • Other -Issues and Bugs Fixed.

Version 1.3.0

  • New -Show Multiple Order Bumps on the checkout page.
  • New -Compatibility with Subscription products.
  • New -Order Bumps Reporting and Behavioral Analytics.
  • Improved -Better Security and Performance.
  • Other -Issues and Bugs Fixed.

Version 1.2.0

  • New -Smart Skip if Already Purchased: Skip order bump if offer product is already purchased.
  • New -Smart Offer Upgrade: Replaces target product with order bump offer product.
  • New -Offer Price Format: Select Offer Price format for Order Bumps.
  • New -Added Compatibility with popular Checkout plugins.
  • Improved -Design Compatibility with popular themes.
  • Improved -Schedule Order Bumps on Mulitple Weekdays.
  • Other -Issues and Bugs Fixed.

Version 1.0.1

  • Improved: Added multiple themes compatibility.

Version 1.0.0

  • First version.
